channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Superstars, shooting stars, and the labour share - Cross-country evidence
item.description: Superstars, shooting stars, and the labour share - Cross-country evidence by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Monday 27 January 2025 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: OECD Monitoring Framework to Measure Homelessness
item.description: OECD Monitoring Framework to Measure Homelessness by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Tuesday 28 January 2025 at 8:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Transforming Catalonia’s Mobility System for Net Zero
item.description: Transforming Catalonia’s Mobility System for Net Zero by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 28 January 2025 at 16:00.

item.title: Tax Challenges Arising from the Digitalisation of the Economy – Consolidated Commentary to the Global Anti-Base Erosion Model Rules (2024) - Inclusive Framework on BEPS
item.description: Tax Challenges Arising from the Digitalisation of the Economy – Consolidated Commentary to the Global Anti-Base Erosion Model Rules (2024) - Inclusive Framework on BEPS by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Friday 31 January 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Poland 2025
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Poland 2025 by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 4 February 2025 at 9:30.

item.title: Global Outlook on Financing for Sustainable Development 2025 - Towards a more resilient and inclusive architecture
item.description: Global Outlook on Financing for Sustainable Development 2025 - Towards a more resilient and inclusive architecture by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Friday 7 February 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: OECD Services Trade Restrictiveness Index - Policy Trends up to 2025
item.description: OECD Services Trade Restrictiveness Index - Policy Trends up to 2025 by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 11 February 2025 at 8:00.

item.title: Consolidated Report on Amount B - Inclusive Framework on BEPS
item.description: Consolidated Report on Amount B - Inclusive Framework on BEPS by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Tuesday 11 February 2025 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: OECD Economics Survey: Ireland 2025
item.description: OECD Economics Survey: Ireland 2025 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 13 February 2025 at 10:00.

item.title: OECD Review of Fisheries 2025
item.description: OECD Review of Fisheries 2025 by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 19 February 2025 at 1:00.

item.title: Does Healthcare Deliver? - Results from the Patient-Reported Indicator Surveys (PaRIS)
item.description: Does Healthcare Deliver? - Results from the Patient-Reported Indicator Surveys (PaRIS) by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 20 February 2025 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Measuring Carbon Footprints of Agri-Food Products - Eight Building Blocks
item.description: Measuring Carbon Footprints of Agri-Food Products - Eight Building Blocks by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Monday 24 February 2025 at 0:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Czechia 2025
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Czechia 2025 by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 4 March 2025 at 11:00.
